info.description: Complete API with JWT authentication, email verification, and CRUD operations
info.title: User Management API with Authentication

post.description: Login with email and password, returns JWT tokens
Logout user and clear refresh token

get.description: Get authenticated user information

post.description: Get new access token using refresh token from cookies
Register a new user with email, sends verification token via email
Set username and password after email verification
Verify email address using the token sent to email

get.description: Get time-series data for log charts (last 24 hours by hour)
Get statistics for all log types (vehicle, sensor, raw)
Get all missions (own missions for regular users, all missions for admins)

post.description: Create a new mission with waypoints

get.description: Get statistics about missions (total, active, completed, draft)
Get a mission by its ID (ownership check applied)

put.description: Update a mission by its ID (ownership check applied)

delete.description: Delete a mission by its ID (ownership check applied)

get.description: Get all permissions

post.description: Create a new permission with name and description
Assign one or more permissions to a role

delete.description: Remove a specific permission from a role
delete.summary: Remove a permission from a role

get.description: Get a specific permission by ID

put.description: Update a permission's name and/or description

get.description: Retrieve raw logs with optional filters (search, time range)

post.description: Create a new raw log entry

get.description: Retrieve statistics for raw logs
Retrieve a specific raw log by ID

delete.description: Delete a raw log by ID

get.description: Get all roles with their permissions

post.description: Create a new role with name and description

get.description: Get a specific role by ID with its permissions

put.description: Update a role's name and/or description

get.description: Retrieve sensor logs with optional filters (vehicle_id, sensor_id, time range)

post.description: Create a new sensor log entry

get.description: Retrieve a specific sensor log by ID

delete.description: Delete a sensor log by ID

get.description: Get all sensor types (accessible to all authenticated users for filtering sensors)

post.description: Create a new sensor type with name and description. Requires sensor_types.manage permission.
post.summary: Create a new sensor type (admin only)

get.description: Get a specific sensor type by ID (accessible to all authenticated users)
get.summary: Get a sensor type by ID

put.description: Update a sensor type's name and/or description. Requires sensor_types.manage permission.

delete.description: Delete a sensor type by ID. Requires sensor_types.manage permission.

get.description: Get all sensor master data (accessible to all authenticated users for assignment)

post.description: Create a new sensor master data with brand, model, and data structure info

get.description: Get a specific sensor by code
Get status of all sensor assignments (admin only or user's own vehicles)
get.summary: Get all sensors status across all vehicles

get.description: Get a specific sensor by ID
Get list of all users

post.description: Create a new user with email, full_name, and password

get.description: Get a single user by ID (own profile or with users.view permission)

put.description: Update user information by ID (own profile or with users.update permission)

get.description: Get the most recent battery status for all vehicles
get.summary: Get latest battery status for all vehicles

get.description: Retrieve vehicle logs with optional filters (vehicle_id, time range)

post.description: Create a new vehicle log entry

get.description: Retrieve the latest log for a specific vehicle
Retrieve a specific vehicle log by ID

delete.description: Delete a vehicle log by ID

get.description: Get all vehicles (own vehicles for regular users, all vehicles for admins)

post.description: Create a new vehicle with code (used as registration & MQTT topic)

get.description: Get a specific vehicle by ID (own vehicle or with vehicles.view permission)

put.description: Update a vehicle's information (own vehicle or with vehicles.update permission)

delete.description: Delete a vehicle by ID (own vehicle or with vehicles.delete permission)

get.description: Get the latest battery status for a vehicle
Get all sensors assigned to a specific vehicle
get.summary: Get all sensors assigned to a vehicle

post.description: Assign a sensor from master data to a vehicle
post.summary: Assign a sensor to a vehicle

get.description: Get detailed status of all sensors assigned to a vehicle including last readings

delete.description: Remove a sensor assignment from a vehicle
delete.summary: Remove a sensor from a vehicle

put.description: Update the status and last reading of a vehicle sensor
put.summary: Update sensor status (for MQTT data updates)

description.example: Acoustic Doppler Current Profiler - measures water current velocity and direction
Sensors for ocean data measurement and analysis

logs.description: Raw log text (changed to text for longer logs)

last_reading.description: JSON string of last sensor reading

BearerAuth.description: Enter your JWT token (Bearer prefix will be added automatically)
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
